title: Aromatherapy Associates
description: After experiencing the positive emotional and physical effects of aromatherapy firsthand, co-founders Geraldine Howard and Sue Beechey channeled their learnings into a line of luxurious, therapeutic-grade essential oil blends designed to balance and renew. cleaned_text: Aromatherapy Associates After experiencing the positive emotional and physical effects of aromatherapy firsthand, co-founders Geraldine Howard and Sue Beechey channeled their learnings into a line of luxurious, therapeutic-grade essential oil blends designed to balance and renew. Handcrafted in the brand's London-based laboratory, all Aromatherapy Associates products contain the highest concentrations of natural ingredients to ensure a truly sensorial experience.
